Class WeatherStation

java.lang.Object
  WeatherStation

public class WeatherStation
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a virtual weather station. Informationen is retrieved from Yahoo Weather.

Version:
26.4.2008. Jetzt mit Proxy und Array der Stadtenamen. Gross/Kleinschreibung bei Namen der St�dte ist nun egal.
Author:
Thomas Karp

Constructor Detail

WeatherStation

public WeatherStation()
Create a new WeatherStation. Default location is berlin. Station is set online.

isOnline

public boolean isOnline()
Get the status of the station.

Returns:
true if online. false if offline.

setCityCode

public void setCityCode(java.lang.String code)
Set code of the city. Code should be like: GMXX0018. You can visit the yahoo weather page to look for existing codes.

Parameters:
The - code of the city.

setCityName

public boolean setCityName(java.lang.String city)
Set the location of the WeaterStation. City is only changed when found in the list.

Parameters:
name - of the city.
Returns:
true, if city exists, false if city was not found.

setOnline

public void setOnline(boolean isOnline)
Set online for real data. Set Offline for testing purposes without internet connection. When offline random values are generated.

Parameters:
New - online status: true if online, false if offline

update

public void update()
Update weather data. If not online, dummy values are set for testing purposes.
